page.title: 15FARMING AND HORSES
page.content: Chester Moor is the rural part of Chester-le-Street.Chester Moor Farm has some horses and 48 Fresian dairy cows but does not make butter or cheese.Cows which have stopped producing milk go to the abattoir.The Farm also grows oats,barley,rape seed and grass.Chester Moor Livery Stables has 3 horse breeds including Thoroughbreds and a Welsh Section B which are entered for local gymkhanas. Plawsworth Stud has 12 stables and 16 race horses and hopes one will enter the Derby.The Stud covers 97 acres, including 62 acres of hay and grazing .The stables are in good condition but there are no riding lessons.
